physical_appearance:\The image shows a digital print
 an artist\u0027s proof
 and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist\u0027s proof are black in colour. They feature two construction workers at work. Both of them are wearing yellow helmets and gloves. They are standing at the top of a building structure
 and bending forwards with a wood plank in their hands. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame
 \\Under Construction\\ is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. \\Tan Lip Seng
